name: jsProScheSim
body:
### jsProSheSim
jsProSheSim is a Javascript library that allows the simulation of a process sheduling system.

The main features are:

* Multiprocessor support
* SRT policy
* Round-robin policy
* FCFS policy

### Live Demo
There is a [jsProSheSim sample application](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/jvilaplana/jsProScheSim/blob/master/index.html) available with a nice web interface.

### How to use
Include the jQuery and the jsProSheSim.js libraries to your HTML page.

```
<script type="text/javascript" src="js/lib/jquery-2.1.1.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="src/jsProScheSim.js"></script>
```

### API

```
var sim = new Simulator();
sim.setProcessors(1);
sim.addQueue('Queue 1', 1, 'FCFS');
sim.addProcess('A', 'Queue 1', 1, 3, [0,1,0,0,1,1,1,0]);
var status = sim.getStatus();
var result = sim.nextStep();
```

### Authors and Contributors
Author: Jordi Vilaplana (@jvilaplana).

### Support or Contact
If you detect any issue or have an improvement suggestion, do not hesitate to [open a new issue](https://github.com/jvilaplana/jsProScheSim/issues).
